name: Glyph Smash
description:
Test your reaction skills in this quick and fun puzzle game about matching and exploding ancient Egyptian style hieroglyphic tiles.

Simply match 2 or more identical adjacent or diagonal glyphs, or a single glyph to the bonus tile - exploding the selected tiles. Try to clear the board in the quickest time possible. As you get closer to the end, the difficulty ramps up as new tiles will pop up to hinder your progress.

Test you eye and touch speed with 3 different speeds from easy to hard - tiles will randomly change glyphs every tick, as well as randomly pop up, depending on your chosen setting.

Compete to log the lowest time across the world with Game Centre leaderboards.

Good luck playing Glyph Smash.
